categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars Look and Find (Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi)
Star Wars Look and Find is a Phoenix International Publications Star Wars children's book part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi book series.

Its original release date was August 18, 2017,[source?] although the online book store Barnes and Noble would ship it before that date, which would make it the first Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi released. The book was later pulled down from the store, but some copies have already arrived by that time and the actual release date was pushed to September 1, 2017.
